about_the_game:
Minigame Madness is a high-difficulty multiplayer party game for 1-16 players online. Compete with friends or strangers in an ever-growing collection of frantic minigames to unlock shiny badges, design stylish outfits & create awesome condos!

KEY FEATURES

  • 🕹️ Massive, ever-growing collection of exciting free-for-all minigames!
  • 🎨 Character customization with unlockable skins, clothes, accessories and more!
  • 🏆 Daily challenges, global leaderboards, achievements, ranks and badges!
  • 📊 Detailed gameplay statistics to track and compare with friends!
  • 🔒 Private server hosting with personalized minigame playlists!
  • 🏠 Creative physics-sandbox player-housing with YouTube-integration!
  • 🚀 Tiny download, quick startup, frequent updates, and Lite is free — jump right in!


THE MINIGAME MEGA-LIST

A massive, ever-growing collection of frantic free-for-all minigames! Knock friends into the abyss in Sumo Shamble, dodge hundreds of giant bullets in Blazing Bullets, and pass the bomb in Explosive Exchange. New minigames of all types and genres will be added regularly!

PLAY HOW YOU WANT

Play minigames back-to-back in Arcade, be the last one standing in Royale, or join forces with your friends in Teams! Compete with up to 16 players in official servers, or host a private one with bots! Experience the madness in first- or third-person mode, with keyboard or controller.

PERSONALIZE YOURSELF

Earn coins by playing minigames, get gems by winning them! Coins can be spent to randomly unbox awesome skins and stylish clothes, while gems can be used to buy the outfit of your dreams! Complete daily challenges to get rich, and buy epic capes, sparkly effects and more!

UNLOCK EVERYTHING

Numerous challenging achievements to unlock, shiny badges to earn, impressive ranks to gain and cool statistics to showcase on your customizable player profile. Compare with friends to see who's the best, and check your position daily on the many global leaderboards!

PICK THE MINIGAMES

Choose the minigames you want to play by voting on random options before each round starts! For more control, you can spend gems to force any minigame from our collection, or even create a personalized playlist for your private server!

BUILD YOUR CONDO

Unwind with friends in your Condo after intense minigame sessions! Use your hard-earned winnings to create epic mansions, impressive museums, thrilling theme parks, Youtube-theaters, and even custom minigames — all within a creative physics-sandbox environment.

OUR FOREVER-GAME

We plan to continue expanding Minigame Madness in content and features indefinitely. Given enough demand we have some crazy ideas like: 16+ player support, modes like Ranked with skill-based matchmaking, reaching 100+ minigames, and so forth!

The growing scope may cause the price to increase in the future, but once purchased you will always have access to Minigame Madness. Excited to have you along for the ride!


Need more madness? Check out these awesome games we're often compared to:
Fall Guys, Stumble Guys, Crab Game, Roblox, Minecraft (Hypixel), Hytale, Pummel Party, Wobbly Life, Tower Unite, s&box & Garry's Mod.
detailed_description:
IMPORTANT

- Try before you buy! All progress in Lite is carried over when you upgrade.

- Playercounts currently fluctuate. Bring a friend for the best experience!
- 13 minigames currently! Unreleased features in the description below are striked.

name: Minigame Madness

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750, AMD Radeon RX 550
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This is subject to change, Minigame Madness is still in development.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Minigame Madness is a high-difficulty multiplayer party game for 1-16 players online. Compete with friends or strangers in an ever-growing collection of frantic minigames to unlock shiny badges, design stylish outfits & create awesome condos!
supported_languages:
English*, Dutch*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Simplified Chinese*, Ukrainian*, Polish*, Turkish*, Japanese*, Korean*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Swedish*, Vietnamese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
